long_description: Light up the Coleman Citronella Candle lantern at your next backyard barbecue or family camping trip. It'll add ambiance and help keep the bugs away. Citronella candle helps repel mosquitoes; candle burns for up to 40 hrs. Hang the Coleman Citronella Candle lantern up or tote it around the campground with the U-shaped metal handle.
short_description: Light up the Coleman Citronella Candle lantern at your next backyard barbecue or family camping trip. It'll add ambiance and help keep the bugs away.
